content.text: I like to can and whittle. I eat exclusively meat. My favorite movie is Good Burger. To stay in shape, I chase cheetahs at the zoo. In high school, I came in 6th in the 100 meter dash.
My daughters say I am a great mother. I have a family of three daughters. I am a woman. I enjoy baking and cooking.
That's interesting! I've never met a woman who likes to chase cheetahs.
I'm not sure if it's because I'm a woman or because I'm a mother, but I do love the challenge. It's a lot of fun to get out there and run around with the cheetahs.
I can imagine! It sounds like a great way to stay in shape.
It is! And it's also a lot of fun.
So, what do you like to bake and cook?
I love to bake anything and everything, but my favorite thing to make is chocolate chip cookies.
Chocolate chip cookies are my favorite too!
So, what's your favorite thing about being a mother?
My favorite thing is watching my daughters grow and learn. It's amazing to see all the things they accomplish.
I can imagine! It must be so rewarding.
It sounds like you have a great life.
